text: 16:19 Aisaia 51:17; Jeremaia 25:15-16; Akar Mogomem 14:8-10; 17:18; 18:5Ezɨ Babilonɨn nguibar ekiam bɨaghiregha 3plan okoruabar otifi, ezɨ gumazamizibar nguibaba bar moghɨra ikufi. God Babilonɨn nguibar ekiamɨn arazir kuram gɨnɨghnɨgha, egha a gamizɨ a uan wainɨn kap bar aneme, kar Godɨn anɨngagharir arazimɨn wainɨn kap.
